name: SpringHill Suites Austin Round Rock

reviews.text: nice, clean new hotel, located 1 exit down from Chili's, Bennigans is walking distance, excellent TexMex food at Chuy's one exit down. Wish these discount suite hotels had a door separating the bedroom from the living area,, had toddler sleeping on the pullout bed. The lobby and pool are very nice. Great breakfast.
reviews.title: great hotel, price an location
Awesome! Perfect for 3 business travellers.
reviews.text: OK I do ALOT of travelling. I had a last minute trip to Dell Headquarters in Round Rock Texas and did a quick internet search and Spring Hill came up, I didn't realize it was a Marriot property. There were 3 of us travelling and we wanted to save money and stay in one room.

reviews.title: Like the floorplan & includes kitchenette
reviews.text: The rate was below $100 and we got a full suite with kitchenette, 2 beds and a pull out couch. We comfortably slept three, had a really filling FREE breakfast in the morning, and the service staff was really helpful booking the next leg of our trip (San Antonio) - where we of course stayed at their other property.
This is the best value for 3 people I have come across - very clean, very nice. HIGHLY recommend this property.
reviews.title: Perfect for extended stay as well

reviews.text: I like the layout of this studio suite: the kitchenette and living room are in front by the door. The bathroom is in the back by the beds. I wish it wasn't a studio, but the price was right and included a couch, chair, coffee table, kitchen table, small microwave, small refrig, and small sink. We only stayed one night in January 2006. We ordered food (free delivery) from a restaurant nearby. The bathroom toilet kept clogging every couple of uses, but the manager sent up a plunger when I called late at night. I was able to unclog it myself after quite a bit of plunging. The next morning it clogged again. The next day I asked for a 30% discount and they obliged plus offered an apology. The staff was pretty nice about it.
reviews.title: Worth it!

aka: Springhill Suites Austin Round Rock Hotel Round Rock
